title: Polo Ralph Lauren 's workforce worldwide 2009 to 2019
summary: In general Number of employees has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of employees is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Number of employees, about 26000.0 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Number of employees about 23000.0 was reached at Year 2014
min_summary: Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year.
Number of employees is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
